name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Burn take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Freeze take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Shock take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Windswept take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with elemental ailments take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Physical.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Gun.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Fire.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Ice.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Electric.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Wind.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Psychokinesis.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Nuclear.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Blessing.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes become weak to Curse.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase damage of allies with Blessings by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Wonder</color> deals 50% more <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color>. Other allies deal 80% less final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Allies will not deal critical hits, but will deal increased <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color> with skills and Resonance. The increase is equal to critical hit rate Ã— (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).

name: Special Effect
desc: Other allies deal 80% less final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: If the party contains Guardians or Medics, decrease all foes' final damage dealt by 60% and increase final damage taken by 20%. If not, increase all foes' final damage dealt by 60%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Physical affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Gun affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Fire affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Ice affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Electric affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Wind affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Psychokinesis affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Nuclear affinity becomes Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Bless affinity becomes Resist.

name: Make Ready!
desc: Increase party's ranged attack damage by 10%.

name: Load!
desc: When any ally runs out of ammo, fully reload after 2 turns.

name: Aim!
desc: When party makes ranged attacks, increase Gun damage by 10%.

name: Fire at Will!
desc: When party makes ranged attacks, increase Gun damage by an additional 10%.

name: Light 'em up!
desc: When any ally runs out of ammo, fully reload after 1 turn.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 Seal of Power stacks. Gain 1 stack when inflicting weakness damage on foes. Lose 1 stack automatically at the end of each turn.
Seal of Power: Increase final damage by 15% per stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
Also gain effects from Stable Domain during battle.
Stable Domain: Allies cannot deal critical hits. Final damage is based on critical rate and critical damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a skill is used or Resonance is activated, gain 1 Seal of Power stack. After all ally actions, increase final damage by 15% for each Seal of Power stack, and then lose 1 stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of each turn, gain 1 Seal of Power for each max HP increase. Gain 1 Seal of Power stack when dealing damage with a Resonance.
Seal of Power: Increase final damage by 10% for each stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When dealing damage with a Resonance, inflict Magnetic Interference on the target.
Magnetic Interference: Increase damage taken by 40% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 1 time.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a Strategist uses a buff skill, all allies gain Yang Energy. When a Saboteur uses a debuff skill, all allies gain Yin Energy.

name: Special Effect
desc: After all ally actions, all foes are inflicted with an elemental ailment, and their taken damage increases by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase Elucidator allies' stat buff effects by 30% and increase weakness damage by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When allies activate a Highlight, all allies obtain 1 Mark of Augmentation.
Mark of Augmentation: Increases Attack by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When an ally spends HP to use a skill, they obtain 4 stacks of Blood's Grace. When allies activate a Highlight, all allies get 2 stacks of Blood's Grace. Lose 1 stack of Blood's Grace at the end of each turn.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When dealing damage with Resonance, healing allies with Resonance, or when health is used to activate a skill, all allies gain 1 stack of Mental Link.
Mental Link: Attack increases by 10% for each stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When dealing damage with Resonance, obtain Wild Fury.
Wild Fury: Final damage increases by 20%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally spends HP to use a skill, they obtain a stack of Bloodbath Blessing.
Bloodbath Blessing: Final damage increases by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Increase Elucidator allies' stat buff effects by 30%. When an ally deals a weakness attack, give user Tremor Amplification.
Tremor Amplification: Increase final damage by 40%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When allies gain a shield, they also gain Charge Field. Allies can also gain Charge Field when they deal weakness damage.
Charge Field: Final damage is increased by 5%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When allies deal weakness damage, they gain 4 Charge Field stacks. When allies gain a shield, they gain 1 Charge Field stack.
Charge Field: Final damage is increased by 5%. Lasts for 1 turn. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 Magnetic Force stacks. Gain 1 stack after dealing weakness damage.
Magnetic Force: Final damage increased by 20% per stack. Lose 1 stack at the end of each turn. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After dealing damage with skills or Resonance, gain 1 Impact stack.
Impact: Deal 5% final damage for each stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: For each <color=#FFFC40>debuff</color> inflicted on foes, their damage taken increases by 6%. Maximum of 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Damage taken by foes increases by 50% once. Afterwards, their damage taken decreases by 50%. Stacks up to 2 times. Resets after 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc: Damage taken by foes decreases by 50% once. Afterwards, their damage taken increases by 20%. Stacks up to 4 times. Resets after 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After the boss takes an action, all allies are inflicted with <color=#FFFC40>Intimidation</color>. When Intimidation is removed, all foes are inflicted with Intimidation.
Intimidation: Decrease Defense by 10%. Maximum of 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: For each <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailment</color> inflicted on foes, damage taken increases by 10%. Maximum of 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever an ally takes damage, that ally's damage increases by 1%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 80 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: The boss will change its affinities. Party's <color=#FFFC40>weakness damage</color> increases by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing</color>, their final damage increases by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing from a Resonance</color>, increase their final damage by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever an ally takes damage, that ally's damage increases by 4%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: For each <color=#FFFC40>debuff</color> inflicted on foes, their damage taken increases by 3%. Maximum of 45%.

name: Special Effect
desc: After party gains <color=#FFFC40>shields</color>, the final damage of their <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color> increases by 8%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' final damage is increased based on their ailment accuracy. Maximum of 150% ailment accuracy, increasing final damage by 15%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase all allies' <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color> critical damage by 25%, and Attack by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Dominion will summon continuous waves of Angels. When an Angel is defeated, SP is restored.
When Dominion is weakened, damage dealt to Angels is added to your score.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Dominion continuously summons waves of Angels. You can restore SP when you defeat an Angel.
When you deal damage to a summoned Angel, your score increases.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After the boss deals damage, the target is inflicted with 1 <color=#FFFC40>Wicked Poison</color> stack.
Wicked Poison: Lose a certain amount of HP at the end of each turn, and increase final damage taken by 10%. Stacks up to 7 times. Can be removed.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 <color=#FFFC40>Berserk</color> stack.
Berserk: Increase final damage by 15%. Can be stacked.

name: Special Effect
desc: Allies with a <color=#FF423F>shield</color> have their final damage taken decreased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing</color>, their final damage taken decreases by 12%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes take 100% increased damage from All-Out Attacks.

name: Special Effect
desc: After foes take damage, party's damage increases by 5%. Maximum of 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a foe is defeated, party's damage increases by 25%. Maximum of 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of battle, all allies lose 50% HP. Also, party's healing and shield effects are increased by 20%, and after receiving healing or a shield, damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase Elucidator allies' <color=#FFFC40>stat buff</color> effects by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Assassin</color> allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Sweeper</color> allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Fire/Ice/Electric/Wind attribute allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Allies with other attributes have their final damage decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Psychokinesis/Nuclear/Bless/Curse attribute allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Allies with other attributes have their final damage decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Physical/Gun/Almighty attribute allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Allies with other attributes have their final damage decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes take 5% increased final damage for each <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailment</color> they have. If a foe has all 4 <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailments</color> at the same time, final damage taken is increased by an additional 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes are susceptible to <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailments</color>. When an ally inflicts a <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailment</color>, their ailment accuracy will be greatly increased. Foes with <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailments</color> take an increased 60% final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When all allies are affected by <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailments</color>, ailment accuracy is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes have increased resistance to spiritual ailments. However, foes affected by a <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailment</color> take 60% increased final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies activate <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color>, increase their final damage by 100%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies inflict <color=#FFFC40>continuous damage</color> effects, final damage is increased by 200%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The Highlight gauge will be filled 20% slower, but Highlights deal 200% increased final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies gain a <color=#FFFC40>shield</color>, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies receive <color=#FFFC40>healing from a Resonance</color>, increase thier final damage by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies get an <color=#FFFC40>extra action</color>, final damage is increased by 120%.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of battle, and at the start of the enemy's action, the enemy will change 1 random affinity to Weak (only the most recent Weak affinity will apply). When the enemy takes damage from a 1 More or All-out Attack, damage taken is increased by 400%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is decreased by 50%, and heal 10% of max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Special Effect
desc: The lower all foes' current HP, the more their final damage is increased. When HP is below 20%, the maximum damage increase is 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle, and after every 5 turns, all allies and enemies take a certain amount of damage and gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFC40>Power of Passion</color>.
Power of Passion: Damage taken increased by 5%. Stacks up to 15 times. Can be removed.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally deals damage with a skill, they gain 1 Attribute Seal. When the total number of Attribute Seals reaches 7, spend all Attribute Seals and activate Starfall.
Starfall: Deals 7 hits of Almighty damage to random foes. Repeated hits on the same foe deal less damage.

name: Special Effect
desc:
<nobr>When an ally uses a <color=#FFFC40>Highlight</color>, gain 1 Blazing Starfire stack. When Blazing Starfire reaches 4 stacks, spend all Blazing Starfire and activate Sparkling Stage.
Sparkling Stage: Randomly grants 10 buffs to allies. The following buffs may each be granted to 1 random ally.
Increase Attack by 15%.
Increase Defense by 22.5%.
Increase max HP by 15%.
Increase damage by 12%.
Increase ailment accuracy by 18%.
Increase pierce rate by 6%.
Increase critical rate by 9%.
Increase critical damage by 18%.
Increase pierce resistance by 7.5%.
Increase weakness damage by 6%.

name: Node Breaker
desc: <color=#FF423F>Node Breaker</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally defeats a foe, gain <color=#fffc40>10</color> deployment points. Increase ally damage by <color=#fffc40>30%</color>.

name: Vulnerability Cracking
desc: <color=#FF423F>Vulnerability Cracking</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally deals weakness damage, gain <color=#fffc40>3</color> deployment points. Increase ally weakness damage by <color=#fffc40>37.5%</color>.

name: Synchro-attack
desc: <color=#FF423F>Synchro-attack</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When allies take damage of their own attribute, gain <color=#fffc40>4</color> deployment points. Increase damage by <color=#fffc40>60%</color> more.

name: Flooding Device
desc: <color=#FF423F>Flooding Device</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. Each time allies attack, gain <color=#fffc40>1</color> deployment point. After every 10 ally attacks, increase party's Attack by <color=#fffc40>40%</color> for 1 turn.

name: Trojan Horse
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Horse</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally activates a Resonance, gain <color=#fffc40>5</color> deployment points (only once per action). Increase ally Resonance damage dealt by <color=#fffc40>60%</color>.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 <color=#FFFC40>Berserk</color> stack.
Berserk: Increase damage by a set amount. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Overload
desc: <color=#FF423F>Overload</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally deals critical damage, gain <color=#fffc40>4</color> deployment points. Increase ally critical rate by <color=#fffc40>18%</color>.

name: Bughack-I0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Bughack-I0</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color> attacks, 80% chance to grant <color=#fffc40>1</color> random weaknesses to the target. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Shieldbreak-N1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Shieldbreak-N1</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, increase target's damage taken from an ally with a shield by <color=#fffc40>30%</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Elemental Combat-T0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Elemental Combat-T0</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color> attacks, increase target's Fire, Ice, Electric, and Wind damage taken by <color=#fffc40>40%</color> for 2 turns. Only activates once per battle.

name: Elemental Combat-E2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Elemental Combat-E2</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, increase target's Psychokinesis, Nuclear, Bless, and Curse damage taken by 40% for 2 turns. Only activates once per battle.

name: Electrojammer-R0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Electrojammer-R0</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, decrease target's damage by <color=#fffc40>25%</color> for 2 turns.

name: Firewall Buster-N3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Firewall Buster-N3</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, increase target's damage taken by <color=#fffc40>5%</color>. Increase damage taken by <color=#fffc40>5%</color> more for each debuff target has, up to <color=#fffc40>30%</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Trojan Replicator-E9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Replicator-E9</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, permanently increase damage taken by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Volt Regulator-T1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Volt Regulator-T1</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, decrease target's critical resistance by <color=#fffc40>9%</color> for 2 turns.

name: Voltage Amp-E2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Voltage Amp-E2</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, increase all allies' all allies' Attack by <color=#fffc40>20%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Firewall Booster-X3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Firewall Booster-X3</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, increase all allies' Defense by <color=#fffc40>30%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Data Recovery-P1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Data Recovery-P1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, restore all allies' HP by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>.

name: Memory Expansion-L9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Memory Expansion-L9</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, restore all allies' SP by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>.

name: Charging-O1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Charging-O1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, 50% chance to fill the Highlight gauge.

name: Trojan Hack-S8
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Hack-S8</color>: After a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, all allies' attacks have a <color=#fffc40>50%</color> chance to inflict 1 random elemental ailment on the target. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Data Encryption-I4
desc: <color=#FF423F>Data Encryption-I4</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, grant the ally with the lowest HP a shield equal to <color=#fffc40>80%</color> of their lost HP (250 or more). Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Chip Overclock-O1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Chip Overclock-O1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, increase all allies' damage by <color=#fffc40>5%</color>. Increase damage <color=#fffc40>0.5%</color> more for each 1% of HP lost, up to <color=#fffc40>40%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Support Enhancer-N9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Support Enhancer-N9</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, increase all allies' damage by <color=#fffc40>2.5%</color>. Increase damage by <color=#fffc40>7.5%</color> more for each <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Algorithm Booster-F1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Algorithm Booster-F1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, decrease Elucidator allies' cooldown time by <color=#fffc40>1</color> turn.

name: Energy Circuit Amp-F2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Energy Circuit Amp-F2</color>: Each time a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color>'s attack hits a foe, increase all allies' damage by <color=#fffc40>8%</color>, up to <color=#fffc40>32%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Electromagnetic Pulse-F3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Electromagnetic Pulse-F3</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, 1 random foe will be Marked. When a Marked foe is attacked, spend Mark to deal a guaranteed critical hit.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Dvesha's Nose is present, all of Dvesha's Mouth's affinities change from Resist to Null.

name: Special Effect
desc: When all of Dvesha's parts are revived, its healing effect is increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Dvesha's Nose can attack even without twitching.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Dvesha's Eye is defeated, the other parts will be strengthened.

name: Special Effect
desc: Dvesha's Eye can place Watchful Eye on 2 foes at the same time.

name: Special Effect
desc: Shorten revival cooldown time for all of Dvesha's parts.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Defense is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' damage is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' damage taken is decreased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Defense is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Attack is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's damage is greatly increased, and damage taken is greatly decreased.

name: Special Effect
desc: When its guards are present, all of Irshya's affinities change from Resist to Null.

name: Special Effect
desc: Decrease allies' damage increase from Power of Money.

name: Special Effect
desc: The effect of Incentivization on guards is increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the end of Piggytron's action, the effect of Berserk is increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Cheerleaders are present, all of Shadow Kiuchi's affinities change to Resist.

name: Special Effect
desc: When preparing, the number of foes targeted by Lock On increases to 2.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of the turn, gain 1 stack of Aphrodite's Blessing. Lose 1 stack when taking damage of the same attribute, and gain 1 stack when taking damage of a different attribute. Aphrodite's Blessing: Start with 2 stacks. Damage taken decreases by 15% for each stack. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Each time Windswept is inflicted, damage increases by 15%. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a Demon Sword Clone is attacked, Shadow Miyazawa's Attack buffs become permanent.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of the action, gain 1 stack of Pan's Protection. Lose 1 stack when taking damage of a different attribute, and gain 1 stack when taking damage of the same attribute. Start with 2 stacks. Damage taken is decreased by 15% for each stack. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When brainwashed, damage dealt becomes normal attack damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When entering the screen, restore 15% HP.

name: Special Effect
desc: When exiting the screen, Attack is permanently increased by 15%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Moha uses Wing Blast, 1 additional foe will be Marked, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The required Wrath for Moha to use Rapid Ascent is reduced to 8.

name: Special Effect
desc: The damage of Moha's Sphinx Dive is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Allies' Ballista Energy gain rate is decreased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase the effect of Moha's Growth, and gain Growth every turn.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Avidya uses Work Order, summon 2 additional Corporobo MDL-AM and Corporobo MDL-DM.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Avidya activates Selfless Devotion, 2 allies are selected at the same time, and their self-destruct damage is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Corporobo MDL-ED's stats are greatly increased. If Corporobo MDL-ED is present when Corporobo MDL-GM is defeated, it immediately summons another Corporobo MDL-GM.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Attack is increased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Attack is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is increased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is increased by 100%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Attack is decreased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Attack is decreased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Attack is decreased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Defense is decreased by 15%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Defense is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' Defense is decreased by 60%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' max HP is decreased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' max HP is decreased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' max HP is decreased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' healing effect is decreased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' shield effect is decreased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Elucidator allies' cooldown time is increased by 2 actions.

name: Special Effect
desc: Decreases allies' Fire, Ice, Electric, and Wind damage by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Decreases allies' Psy, Nuclear, Bless, and Curse damage by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: End the battle within 80 turns without any allies defeated.

name: Special Effect
desc: End the battle within 60 turns without any allies defeated.

name: Special Effect
desc: End the battle within 40 turns without any allies defeated.

name: Special Effect
desc: Decreases allies' Fire, Ice, Electric, and Wind damage by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Decreases allies' Psy, Nuclear, Bless, and Curse damage by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Elucidator allies' cooldown time is increased by 6 actions.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' healing effects are decreased by 45%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' shield effects are decreased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' healing effects are decreased by 100%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' shield effects are decreased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The Wraith of Envy will continuously summon minions to fight.

name: Special Effect
desc: The Wraith of Envy can Lock On to 1 more target, and its max HP is increased by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy locks on to a target, its Attack increases by 10%, and the target's damage taken increases by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy locks on to a target, its Attack increases by 20%, and the target's damage taken increases by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy locks on to a target, its Attack increases by 30%, and the target's damage taken increases by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The damage of the Wraith of Envy's Dark Whisper is increased by 15% and its Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The damage of the Wraith of Envy's Dark Whisper is increased by 35% and its Attack is increased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
